title: Social Media and Gender Identity (STUDENT TAKEOVER)
description: In this episode, students from BHASVIC college in Hove discuss a mini research project they completed on the topic of gender identity and social media. Imogen, Erin, Rosie and Juno set themselves a a hypothesis of 'Twitter and Instagram has given women and non-binary individuals more freedom with gender expression'
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
